summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Canvas Builder with Tiptap Rich Text Editor. All 10 requested features tested and working correctly.

console_warnings.issue: Tiptap console warning: 'Duplicate extension names found: [link, underline]'. This is a minor warning that doesn't affect functionality but should be addressed.

action_items: MINOR: Fix Tiptap duplicate extension warning in RichTextEditor.js - the 'link' and 'underline' extensions may be registered twice (once in StarterKit and once explicitly)
critical_code_review_comments: RichTextEditor.js: StarterKit already includes some extensions. The explicit imports of Link and Underline may cause duplicate registration. Consider removing duplicates or using StarterKit.configure() to exclude them.

success_rate.backend: N/A - Backend testing skipped as requested

seed_data_creation: None - used existing test user and workspace
context_for_next_testing_agent: Canvas Builder is fully functional. All block types work (text, heading, image, video, file, button, divider, spacer, problem). Tiptap editor supports Bold/Italic/Underline via keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+B/I/U) and toolbar buttons. RTL/Hebrew support auto-detects based on content. Step timeline and sidebar navigation work correctly. Minor console warning about duplicate Tiptap extensions should be addressed but doesn't affect functionality.
